back: Your smile is the first thing I think about when I wake up and the last thing I see before I sleep. It lights up my entire world and makes even the darkest days bright. Never stop smiling, my love.

I love how you scrunch your nose when you're concentrating. And how you dance when you're cooking. And how you hum that song you can't remember the name of. I love every little quirk that makes you, you.
Thank you for being patient with me, for believing in me when I doubt myself, and for loving me at my worst. You make me want to be better every single day.
You're not just my girlfriend, you're my best friend, my adventure buddy, my comfort zone, and my home. With you, I'm exactly where I'm meant to be.
I dream about our future together – lazy Sunday mornings, adventures to far-off places, building our home, maybe a couple of pets. Every dream I have includes you in it, because you ARE my dream.
I love you. Not just on your good days, but every single day. Not just when it's easy, but especially when it's hard. Not just for who you are, but for who we become together.
On days when you doubt yourself, remember that you're brilliant, capable, and absolutely incredible. And if you ever forget, I'll be right here to remind you, every single time.

Your laughter is my favorite sound in the entire world. The way you throw your head back when something is really funny, how your eyes crinkle at the corners – it's pure magic. I'd do anything to hear that laugh every day.
We've grown so much together, learned from each other, supported each other's dreams. You've made me a better person, and I hope I do the same for you. Here's to growing old together, my love.

Right now, wherever you are reading this, I want you to know that I'm thinking of you. I'm thinking about your beautiful face, your kind heart, and how lucky I am to call you mine. Happy Birthday, my everything. 💝
